data.name: InvalidOptions
data.value:
"GitHub Copilot Translation" is selected as the translation module.
To use GitHub Copilot translation, the GitHub Copilot CLI must be installed and logged in.
For GitHub Copilot CLI installation, refer to the [GitHub Copilot CLI documentation](https://docs.github.com/en/copilot/github-copilot-in-the-cli).

data.name: Model_Desc
data.value: ID of the model available on GitHub Copilot (e.g., gpt-4o, claude-sonnet-4.5)

data.name: NotInitialized
data.value: GitHub Copilot functionality is not initialized. Please make sure the GitHub Copilot CLI is installed.

data.name: TranslateContext
data.value: Contextual information to be used during translation
